title: Spirit Links

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Throw a spirit link at a player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-These tiny palm sized hats will cause a random effect on a player
-These effects can range from healing their target to completely banning them from the game. There are no limits
-These effects should mostly be negative, but can also be positive
-The host should use a randomized wheel to determine if the effect is harmful or helpful
-You learn the effect you apply to your target

desc:
Post 2664
_The rocks are a source of power. Neat!_
